source: Lähde vetämään täältä.
references: Get out of here.
hypothesis: Get out of here.

source: Lähde vetämään.
references: Fucking retard.
hypothesis: Go pull.

source: Syyttömiä tuomitaan joskus, vaikka he maksavat itsensä kipeäksi.
references: There are some people that, no matter how much money they threw at the case, were convicted and shouldn't have been.
hypothesis: Innocent people are sometimes convicted, even if they pay dearly.

source: Maksoimme itsemme kipeiksi siitä.
references: - Paid through the nose for it.
hypothesis: We paid ourselves sick for it.

source: Jos lapsi sattuu sairastumaan, maksat itsesi kipeäksi lääkkeistä.
references: Yeah, well, Fiona already said if I have the baby, she's throwing me out, so I don't even care if we lose the house.
hypothesis: If the child happens to get sick, you will pay yourself a lot for the medicine.

source: Kun tulit Los Angelesiin, sinulla ei ollut muuta, kuin matti kukkarossa.
references: You show up to L.A., you got nothin' but your ding-dong in your hands.
hypothesis: When you came to Los Angeles, you had nothing but Matti in your purse.

source: Omalla kohdallani matti kukkarossa on pieni este.
references: Speaking for myself, bone-crushing poverty is something of a stumbling block.
hypothesis: In my case, Matti has a small obstacle in the purse.

source: On matti kukkarossa, pöljä!
references: We are broke, you dumbass!
hypothesis: It's Matti in the purse, you bastard!

source: Kuin menneen talven lumet.
references: As in... burnt bread.
hypothesis: Like the snows of last winter.

source: - Vai menneen talven lumia?
references: Water under the bridge?
hypothesis: - Or last winter's snow?

source: Buck on menneen talven lumia, kaikki muut tietävät sen.
references: - Okay. It is over for Buck and everyone knows it but him.
hypothesis: Buck is last winter's snow, everyone else knows that.

source: - Ensimmäinen päiväni meni pipariksi.
references: First day on the job, I lead us straight into an ambush.
hypothesis: - My first day was a mess.

source: Koko homma meni pipariksi! Juokse!
references: The whole thing's gone in the crapper, kid!
hypothesis: The whole thing went haywire! Run!

source: Hyvä on, menen piparittomana.
references: All right, I'll go cookie-less.
hypothesis: All right, I'll go pepperless.

source: Se meni putkeen.
references: - That's right. All the way.
hypothesis: It went down the drain.

source: No, jos tämä kaikki menee putkeen niin haluan tehdä sen oikein.
references: Well, if this all connects, I want to do it right.
hypothesis: Well, if this all works out, I want to do it right.

source: Jokin ilmiselvästi meni putkeen, koska tienasitte miljoonan.
references: Obviously it was something because you made a million bucks in two months.
hypothesis: Something obviously went wrong because you made a million.

source: Tämä menee yli hilseen.
references: Has he really nothing else to do round here?
hypothesis: This goes over the top.

source: Tämä meni yli hilseen.
references: This is just way over my head.
hypothesis: This went over the top.

source: - Tekoäly menee yli hilseen.
references: All this A.I. stuff is way out of my league.
hypothesis: - Artificial intelligence goes overboard.

source: Shane jäi kuin nalli kalliolle! Britit voittivat kirkkaasti!
references: After our first-innings victory, Jeremy decided that for the second challenge, we should re-run a race we'd first tried against the Germans.
hypothesis: Shane was left like a teddy bear on a rock! The British won resoundingly!

source: Et voi jättää toista kuin nallia kalliolle.
references: But you cannot just leave someone alone like that!
hypothesis: You can't leave anything but a teddy bear on a rock.

source: Päämieheni maksoi häät, ja hänet jätettiin kuin nalli kalliolle.
references: In this case, my client paid for the wedding and was hung out to dry.
hypothesis: My main man paid for the wedding and he was left like a teddy bear on a rock.

source: Miten nenänvalkaisu sujuu?
references: How's the drying out going?
hypothesis: How does nose whitening work?

source: Miten sujuu? -Mikä? No liikunta, tupakkalakko, nenänvalkaisu...
references: You know: exercise, no smoking, no drinking...
hypothesis: How are you getting along? -What? Well, exercise, no smoking, nose whitening...

source: Taisi nousta väärällä jalalla tänään.
references: Talk about getting off on the wrong foot.
hypothesis: I guess I got off on the wrong foot today.

source: - Nousitko väärällä jalalla?
references: - You got up the wrong side, huh?
hypothesis: - Did you get off on the wrong foot?

source: Nousitko väärällä jalalla sängystä?
references: Did someone wake up on the wrong side of the bed?
hypothesis: Did you get out of bed on the wrong foot?

source: - Hän oikaisi koipensa.
references: Gave him a break.
hypothesis: - He straightened his moth bush.

source: Taisimme joutua ojasta allikkoon.
references: Looks like the fat's not out of the fire yet.
hypothesis: I think we got out of the ditch and into the spring.

source: Ryhmän päämajassa asiat menevät ojasta allikkoon.
references: Back at base, things are going from bad to worse.
hypothesis: At the group's headquarters, things go from bad to worse.

source: Jouduimmekohan ojasta allikkoon?
references: Out of the frying pan; hopefully, not into the fire.
hypothesis: Did we fall from the ditch into the spring?

source: Jonkun on pakko leikata vanhat oksat pois.
references: - Someone's got to do it. Someone's got to cut away the old wood.
hypothesis: Someone has to cut the old branches off.

source: Nousen kohta ylös ja järjestän sellaisen kohtauksen että oksat pois.
references: Paul, I'm gonna get up and make the biggest scene you can imagine.
hypothesis: I'll get up right away and arrange such a scene that the branches will be removed.

source: Oletko nähnyt Janen vihaisena? Siinä ovat oksat poissa.
references: Have you ever seen Jane in full flight?
hypothesis: Have you seen Jane angry? There the branches are gone.

source: Hän on hukassa, herra. Pakkomielteinen.
references: She's undone, sir.
hypothesis: He's lost, sir. Obsessive.

source: llman venepyssyä, olemme hukassa.
references: Without the punt gun, I feel we're lost.
hypothesis: Without a boat gun, we're lost.

source: Jos olet hukassa tässä talossa, mene pelloille.
references: If you're lost in this house go back to the land!
hypothesis: If you are lost in this house, go to the fields.

source: Kun kerran käännät kelkkasi olet hukassa.
references: Once you tergiversate, you're lost.
hypothesis: Once you turn your sled, you're lost.

source: Makaatte alastomana keskellä kampusta - kuollut lammas päänne päällä.
references: Ma'am, you are lying naked in the middle of campus with a dead sheep on your head.
hypothesis: You are lying naked in the middle of the campus - a dead sheep on your head.

source: - Se oli lammas. Millainen hummeri on?
references: Just plating up the pork and lamb now.
hypothesis: - It was a sheep. What is a lobster like?

source: Nämä ei ole lampaita, vaan tuoreita poneja.
references: These ain't sheep. These is fresh nags.
hypothesis: These are not sheep, but fresh ponies.

source: Rikoit Talon sääntöjä, kun löit vetoa pelistä, - jossa sinulla on oma lehmä ojassa.
references: You broke with House rules when you bet on a game that you hold a personal stake in.
hypothesis: You broke the House Rules when you bet on a game where you have your own cow in the ditch.

source: Alalla on oma lehmänsä ojassa niiden kanssa, - jotta eläimet nähdään yhä, - söpöinä nallukoina, jotka ovat täysin turvallisia.
references: The industry has a vested interest in spinning these so that the animals continue to appear like cuddly teddy bears that are completely safe.
hypothesis: The industry has its own cow in the ditch with them, - so that the animals are still seen, - as cute teddies that are completely safe.

source: - Minulla on tässä oma lehmä ojassa.
references: It's mostly selfish on my part.
hypothesis: - I have my own cow in the ditch here.

source: Kerron sinulle opetuksen, jonka opin kantapään kautta.
references: Let me give you a lesson that I had to learn the hard way.
hypothesis: Let me tell you a lesson I learned the hard way.

source: Joskus heidän on opittava kantapään kautta.
references: Sometimes, they have to learn the hard way. If Hazel rejects your advice, let her.
hypothesis: Sometimes they have to learn the hard way.

source: Minun täytyi oppia kantapään kautta. Minä opin.
references: If I did it, I was gonna do it and I was gonna learn the lesson the hard way, which I did, repeatedly.
hypothesis: I had to learn the hard way. I learned.

source: Minä otan tilaisuudesta vaarin, vaikka lapsia ei kiinnostaisikaan.
references: Well, I'm gonna take advantage of this opportunity even if you children aren't interested.
hypothesis: I will take advantage of the opportunity, even if the children are not interested.

source: On otettava tilaisuudesta vaarin.
references: And when you have an opportunity, you take it.
hypothesis: The opportunity must be taken care of.

source: Mukava nähdä, että otat tilaisuudesta vaarin.
references: Glad to seeyou're taking advantage of the opportunities offered.
hypothesis: Nice to see that you are taking advantage of the opportunity.

source: Yli 800 ihmistä joutui viime vuonna vampyyrien uhriksi Louisianassa. Viranomaiset eivät pane tikkua ristiin.
references: You know, last year there were over 800 reported vampire-related attacks in Louisiana alone, and the law won't do nothing about it.
hypothesis: More than 800 people fell victim to vampires in Louisiana last year. The authorities don't give a damn.

source: Aiotko sietää ryöstöt ja tapot panematta tikkua ristiin?
references: Are you ready to put up with looting and killing without lifting a finger?
hypothesis: Are you going to put up with robberies and Killings without giving a damn?

source: Eihän se että minä annan tarkoita että mies panisi tikun ristiin takiani.
references: Just because I'm giving doesn't mean I can expect a man to lift a finger for me.
hypothesis: The fact that I give doesn't mean that the man will give up on me.

source: Pata kattilaa soimaa.
references: Yeah? Look who's talking.
hypothesis: A pot of soima.

source: -Pata kattilaa soimaa.
references: It takes one to know one.
hypothesis: - Boil a pot of soima.

source: - Pata kattilaa soimaa.
references: - Look who's talking.
hypothesis: - A pot of soima.

source: Minulla on peukalo keskellä kämmentä.
references: I'm all thumbs today.
hypothesis: I have a thumb in the middle of my palm.

source: Hänellä on peukalo keskellä kämmentä.
references: He seems to be all thumbs.
hypothesis: He has a thumb in the middle of his palm.

source: Ja Thomasilla kun on peukalo keskellä kämmentä.
references: Thomas will be very busy. He's all fingers and thumbs.
hypothesis: And Thomas has his thumb in the middle of his palm.

source: En minä olekaan pieniin päin.
references: I'm not in the family way after all.
hypothesis: I'm not into small things.

source: Onnittelu, olet toden totta pieniin päin.
references: Congratulations. Your test confirms you, in fact, have a baby on the way. How about that?
hypothesis: Congratulations, you are so true to the little ones.

source: Betsillä ja minulla on vaikea päästä pieniin päin, jos tajuatte.
references: You know, um, well, Betts and I are, uh... We're having a hell of a time getting in a family way, if you catch my drift.
hypothesis: Bets and I have a hard time getting to the little ones, if you understand.

source: Jalkani ovat turvonneet seisoskelusta pihkan edessä.
references: My feet are swollen from standing in front of the Amber all day.
hypothesis: My feet are swollen from standing in front of the pitch.

source: Ja hän taitaa olla pihkassa sinuun.
references: Plus, I think she's got a little thing for you.
hypothesis: And he seems to have a crush on you.

source: Koska olit pihkassa minuun.
references: 'Cause you were into me.
hypothesis: Because you were into me.

source: Äitisi antoi meille patoja ja pannuja vaikka meillä on jo niitä pilvin pimein.
references: Your mom said we can't leave without pots and pans. I told her I had some, and then she handed me pots and pans.
hypothesis: Your mother gave us pots and pans even though we already have them in the darkest of clouds.

source: Jalkaväkeä oli pilvin pimein.
references: Arty and infantry just kept on coming.
hypothesis: The infantry was in the darkest of clouds.

source: - Niitä on pilvin pimein. Mersu, Mersu, Mersu, Mersu...
references: We stopped to let the twin turbo V8 cool, but then... it decided to die.
hypothesis: - They are the darkest of clouds. Mersu, Mersu, Mersu, Mersu...

source: Miten vanha hän oli, kun hän potkaisi tyhjää?
references: So how old was she when she finally blasted off?
hypothesis: How old was he when he kicked empty?

source: Se on voimassa vasta, kun on potkaissut tyhjää.
references: Yes. It's only effective after you've kicked the bucket.
hypothesis: It is only valid when you have kicked a blank.

source: Äiti potkaisee tyhjää, kun saa tietää tästä.
references: No beer. We shouldn't even be doing this here. Mom's gonna die when she finds out about all this.
hypothesis: Mom will be kicking herself when she finds out about this.

source: Pukki kaalimaan vartijana.
references: You're kind of like the wolf guarding the henhouse, Fred.
hypothesis: Goat as a guard.

source: Teillä menee puurot ja vellit sekaisin!
references: Then why are you comparing apples and oranges?
hypothesis: You're messing up porridges and vells!

source: Kiusallinen rauhansopimus Espanjan kanssa on rikkana rokassa.
references: There's always the awkward detail of Your Majesty's treaty with Spain.
hypothesis: The awkward peace treaty with Spain is in ruins.

source: Siinä oli ruista ranteessa.
references: Ooh, is there stuff on that pitch!
hypothesis: It had rye on the wrist.

source: B.A., tiedämme että sinulla on ruista ranteessasi.
references: And B.A. we know you've got the bulk, baby.
hypothesis: BA, we know you have a ring on your wrist.

source: - Hänellä on ruista ranteessa.
references: She could do anything. Yeah.
hypothesis: - He has a ring on his wrist.

source: Ehkä hän haluaa saada heidät kiinni rysän päältä.
references: I guess he's trying to catch them at it or...
hypothesis: Maybe he wants to catch them red-handed.

source: Smith jäi kiinni rysän päältä varastaessaan lapsilta.
references: Smith was caught red-handed stealing from boys.
hypothesis: Smith was caught red-handed stealing from children.

source: Jäikö hän kiinni rysän päältä?
references: Oh my God! - What, then you caught her?
hypothesis: Did he get caught in the crossfire?

source: Yksi ilta vettä satoi kuin esterin perseestä.
references: One night, man, it was just raining like fuck, man.
hypothesis: One night it rained like an ester from an ass.

source: Elena lähti soitellen sotaan.
references: She went in with no extraction plan, no idea how to find mack.
hypothesis: Elena went off to war calling.

source: Saat käyttöösi tutkia, satelliitteja ja pari lentokonetta. Emme ryntää soitellen sotaan.
references: Ground troops are still out.
hypothesis: You get to explore, satellites and a couple of planes. We don't rush into war.

source: Et voi lähteä soitellen sotaan avaruusolentoja vastaan.
references: Fighting Alchemy or Savitar or aliens isn't something you just show up and try.
hypothesis: You can't go to war against aliens by calling.

source: - Älä soita suutasi.
references: Don't you brash me.
hypothesis: - Don't run your mouth.

source: Soitit suutasi psykopaattien edessä.
references: You had to run your mouth in front of psychopaths, didn't you?
hypothesis: You played your mouth in front of psychopaths.

source: Soitan suutani, mutta sanon harvoin suorat sanat.
references: I mean, I talk a good game, but I very rarely tell people what I think to their face.
hypothesis: I play with my mouth, but I rarely say direct words.

source: Ja sokerina pohjalla, - minulla on Lontoon paras äänentoistojärjestelmä.
references: And to top it off... I got the baddest system in all of London.
hypothesis: And to top it all off, - I have the best sound system in London.

source: Ja sokerina pohjalla Anne Dettrey, muotitoimittajamme.
references: And last, as a kind of dessert, Anne Dettrey, our fashion editor.
hypothesis: And as sugar on the bottom, Anne Dettrey, our fashion editor.

source: Ja sokerina pohjalla - ulkona on limusiinikolonna - valmiina viemään meidät - strippiklubille!
references: And last but not least... there is a fleet of limos outside... waiting to take us to... a strip club!
hypothesis: And to top it all off - there's a limousine convoy outside - ready to take us - to the strip club!

source: Nyt tulee tupenrapinat.
references: He's going to be so angry.
hypothesis: Now comes vaginal cramping.

source: Nyt tuli tupenrapinat
references: ROSE! WHAT ARE YOU DOING?
hypothesis: Now came vaginal cramps

source: Nyt tuli tupenrapinat.
references: - [ Whimpering Laugh ] Oh, I'm in trouble.
hypothesis: Now came vaginal cramps.

source: Toisin kuin sinä, joka vain seisot tumput suorina - minä päätin tehdä jotain.
references: So unlike you... who seems to be completely comfortable just standing around like some fucking pussy... I decided to do something about it.
hypothesis: Unlike you, who just stand there dumbfounded - I decided to do something.

source: Miksi täällä seistään tumput suorina?
references: What is everybody doing standing around here?
hypothesis: Why are we standing here straight?

source: En voi vain seisoa tumput suorina.
references: You can't expect me to do nothing.
hypothesis: I just can't stand up straight.

source: lnfektion mahdollisuus kasvaa joka sekunti, jonka hän on auki. Lisäksi tuhlaat tuhansia dollareita, kun seisot siinä tumput suorina.
references: The rate of infection for this patient is increasing every second you keep him open, not to mention the thousands of dollars you're wasting standing here doing nothing.
hypothesis: The chance of infection increases every second it is open. Plus, you'll be wasting thousands of dollars standing there with your butts straight.

source: Roger voi tykätä kyttyrää.
references: - Roger may take a dim view of this...
hypothesis: Roger may like a hunchback.

source: Anna potkut, jos tykkäät kyttyrää.
references: And if you don't like that, you can just fire me.
hypothesis: Get fired if you like hunchback.

source: Taidat tykätä kyttyrää.
references: - Getting a hint of disapproval.
hypothesis: I guess you like the hunchback.

source: -Loppuvaiheen syöpä - laukkaava.
references: - Terminal cancer. Raging.
hypothesis: - End-stage cancer - galloping.

source: Se oli raju vaihe, jossa Linnunrata nielaisi lähimmät galaksit.
references: OUR GALAXY TURNS ON ITS COSMIC SIBLINGS.
hypothesis: It was a violent phase where the Milky Way was engulfing the Nearest Galaxies.

source: - Pääsemmekö läpi vaiheisilla?
references: Could we get through with our phasers?
hypothesis: - Will we get through in stages?

source: Luulin, että ryöstelisimme jo tässä vaiheessa pankkeja - emmekä bensarekkoja jossain Jumalan selän takana.
references: I thought we'd be robbing banks by now, not some gas truck in the middle of nowhere.
hypothesis: I thought we'd already be robbing banks at this point - and not gas trucks somewhere behind God's back.

source: Voimme varmaankin sanoa, että tässä vaiheessa menitte ojasta allikkoon.
references: I never thought I'd hear him say that. Safe to say this is when the mission went from the frying pan into the fire.
hypothesis: We can probably say that at this point you went from ditch to ditch.

source: Missä vaiheessa aloit tuntea olevasi hukassa?
references: At what point did you begin to feel lost?
hypothesis: At what point did you start feeling lost?

source: Hän on vaihtamassa hiippakuntaa.
references: He's getting fitted for a halo.
hypothesis: He is changing dioceses.

source: En halua olla vastarannankiiski, mutta nautin tästä.
references: I think that's the point! I don't mean to be a contrarian, - but I'm enjoying this.
hypothesis: I don't want to be a rant, but I'm enjoying this.

source: Et enää erota vastarannankiiskejä.
references: No more dismissing anyone who disagrees.
hypothesis: You don't separate the opposing sides anymore.

source: Taisi vetää herneen nenään.
references: That pissed her off.
hypothesis: I think he pulled a pea up his nose.

source: Jotkut vetävät herneen nenään.
references: Some people get pissed off, saying we're taking over.
hypothesis: Some pull a pea up their nose.

source: Älä vedä hernettä nenään.
references: Keep your knickers on.
hypothesis: Don't pull a pea up your nose.

source: Olen todella vetänyt hirsiä!
references: Have I been sawing wood up there!
hypothesis: I've really been pulling logs!

source: En, vedän hirsiä kymmeneltä.
references: No, no, I'll be sawing wood at 10:00.
hypothesis: No, I pull the log at ten.

source: Vähän isompana toivoin törmääväni siihen ja vetäväni turpaan.
references: When I got older, I wanted to bump into him and beat him up.
hypothesis: When I was a little bigger, I hoped I would run into it and pull the plug.

source: - Tuut kans tai vedän turpaan.
references: You better come back or else I'm gonna kick your ass.
hypothesis: - You bring the lid or I'll pull the plug.

source: Ehkä voisit antaa minulle listan kaikista existäsi jotta tietäisin edes kuka minua seuraavaksi vetää turpaan.
references: Maybe you could just give me a list of all of your exes so that I can at least know who's going to beat my ass into the ground next.
hypothesis: Maybe you could give me a list of all your exes so I'll even know who's going to fuck me next.

source: Sitten vinttini pimeni.
references: And then I...
hypothesis: Then my winch went dark.

source: Sanoin, että vintti pimeni. Olit kauhuissasi.
references: I said, "Dead out, he was scared shitless.
hypothesis: I said it got dark. You were terrified.

source: Vintti pimeni.
references: I blacked out.
hypothesis: The wind went dark.

source: Ei tarvitse vääntää rautalangasta.
references: - You don't have to draw me pictures.
hypothesis: No need to twist the iron wire.

source: Cheerleaderille pitää kaikki vääntää rautalangasta.
references: Jeez, you gotta spell everything out for the cheerleader.
hypothesis: For a cheerleader, everything has to be twisted.

source: - Pitääkö minun vääntää rautalangasta?
references: We should wait for Captain Teitel.
hypothesis: - Do I have to twist the iron wire?

source: Yritys hyvä kymmenen.
references: Then give him an A for effort, Andy.
hypothesis: Company good ten.

source: Yritys hyvä kymmenen, mutta luulenpa että onnemme loppui.
references: A great ride, friend. But I have a feeling it's about over.
hypothesis: A good ten, but I think our luck has run out.

source: Yritys hyvä kymmenen, vaikka häviäisitte.
references: Win or lose, you are giving it your best shot.
hypothesis: Company good ten, even if you lose.

source: Kaikki elävät koodinmurtajamme ovat äimän käkenä.
references: All of our living code breakers are absolutely stumped.
hypothesis: All of our live codebreakers are in good hands.

source: - Olenkin äimän käkenä.
references: - Yeah, well, I'm fucking surprised.
hypothesis: - I'm a mother-in-law.

source: Olin äimän käkenä.
references: I'm thinking, "What the hell?"
hypothesis: I was with my mother.

source: Minusta se on äidin näköinen.
references: Mum says so, but... looks more like her.
hypothesis: I think it looks like a mother.

source: Olet aivan äitisi näköinen.
references: You look like your mother. Let me help you.
hypothesis: You look exactly like your mother.

source: Sanovat, että olen äidin näköinen.
references: They say I look like her. - That's because you do.
hypothesis: They say I look like my mother.
